did.unittitle: Mollie H. Bowers Collection of Arbitration and Fact Finding Decisions Regarding Police and Fire Fighters
did.abstract: This collection consists of arbitration files and final offer cases relating to police and fire fighters.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Mollie H. Bowers was a research consultant for the International Association of Chiefs of Police.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of arbitration files and final offer cases relating to police and fire fighters.
